scenario_text.value:
Oof...! *huff* *huff*... I knew it, this jerk
really is bad news!
Get up, Shakomon! You gotta hang in there!

If we don’t stop this thing...everyone...the
little ones at the school are in danger!

I know! It won’t...get past me...no matter
what!
Shakomon... Thank you! And sorry...
What’re you saying sorry for?

All I’m doing is putting you through such
painful situations.

That’s not true. We’ve fought together...and
that’s why we’re here now!

I’ve never had a bad time with you! The
opposite... I’m happy I can help you out!
...Shakomon!

I’ve always been protected... By Kaito, by
the others...

But not anymore! I am done being the one
everyone else looks out for!

To prove that... To help everyone... We’ll
put this freak in its place!

So please, Shakomon! Let’s let ’im have it...
Give me more of your strength!
Augh! Gah... Ngah... Gahah...!
Shakomon?! Oh... I think I know what this is!

*huff* *huff*... That...unwavering desire to
protect everyone...

It’s giving—hah! Giving me strength...! The
strength...to protect you!
Peep... Pyu...
Are you...chirping?!
Peep...pyuuu!

W-wow... I can’t believe how strong you are!
I’ve never seen anything like it!!!
